page.title: 18ATTITUDES AND SOCIAL CONCERN
page.content: Many people feel that the area is poorly served in many respects when compared with nearby towns. The inadequacy of medical facilities causes much concern among the population in general for often a long journey is necessary to receive treatment. The facilities for the community are constantly criticized in particular the absence of a social services centre in an unemployment blackspot and in an area with a high divorce rate. Young people feel aggrieved at the expense of facilities and many travel to other towns for entertainment.The poor range of shops nearby also causes concern as this increases the cost of living and limits the choice of goods available. Most people do like the proximity to rural life.
